Carnage/Teltoli

* Carnage sighed, so she had heard her? She nodded to Cyber Claw then turned 
to Teltoli, and smiled.*

Carnage: " Now, let's get you home."

*Teltoli eyed Cyber Claw but sighed, she really had no choice but to trust 
this new bot. She nodded and launched herself into the air, she beat her 
wings and caught a thermal. Teltoli made sure that she kept a distance away 
from Cyber Claw, just to be safe!
Carnage sighed and transformed into her Beast Mode, if this clone could get 
her to the Maximal base then she could leave Teltoli in good hands and go 
off to give Megatron a piece of her mind!
She looked up and opened her com-link to Cyber Claw...*

"Glad to see that you changed your mind, obviously we share more then the 
passion to rip Megatron's head from his body."

* Carnage began to run towards the direction that she knew the Maximal base 
lied in, she sighed. There was so much that she could tell Cyber Claw about 
the horrors of her childhood, about how her own body had been altered 
through torture that was meant to discipline. Her vertebral spikes for one, 
she had not been born with them.
It was unfair that a clone, let alone a bot even had to put up with the same 
torture.
Carnage thought, perhaps this bot was just alone or misunderstood.
She sighed, the least she could do was let Cyber Claw know her name.
Carnage reopened her com-link...*

" The name's...Carnage.*
